messages.subject: Re: Jamie Oliver was Why, oh why have the TV? Please passionate
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 01/28/2002 3:48:08 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Iron Chef is a blast! Since we bought the house I watch a LOT of HGTV. I like the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 01/28/2002 3:48:08 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> HAH, Naked chef is *ok* but IRON CHEF rules all..
>
> We are fully addicted to that show, every once of us races to the tv when
> it's one so we can guess what 'new' ingredient will be unveiled and how the
> chefs will prepare them..Then we try and fathom what they taste like (and
> we end up with some gagging noises sometimes!!)..Matter of fact this has
> sparked our newest 'idea'..Once every other month we are going to
> experiment with different types of foods, I think Japanese will be our
> first since it's our 'inspiration'..we're still working out the details but
> we will either be attempting to cook a traditional meal or finding a
> restaurant and experiencing a traditional meal :grin:..
>
>
Iron Chef is a blast!

Since we bought the house I watch a LOT of HGTV. I like the decorating shows
that are funky, like the one where two families decorate each other's houses.
Kathryn



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
